payload.name: Demo Tool
payload.description: Demo Tool is a sample entry used to validate the end-to-end submission and PR approval flow. It includes the minimal required fields defined by the schema, with placeholder yet realistic values for quick testing purposes across all sections.
payload.key_differentiator: Lightweight setup, clear API docs, sensible defaults, and fast integration for small teams.

use_cases.title: Automate onboarding
use_cases.details: Use webhooks and the SDK to auto-provision users and projects.

use_cases.title: Generate reports
use_cases.details: Schedule batch jobs and export dashboards to PDF for stakeholders.

qa.question: Is there a free plan?
qa.answer: Yes, a generous free tier is available.

qa.question: Do you have an API?
qa.answer: Yes, with REST endpoints and SDKs for JS and Python.

qa.question: How long is data retained?
qa.answer: Defaults to 30 days; configurable on paid tiers.

qa.question: Is SSO supported?
qa.answer: Yes, via SAML and OIDC on Business plans.

qa.question: Do you support webhooks?
qa.answer: Yes, for key lifecycle events like user created.

qa.question: Can I export my data?
qa.answer: Yes, CSV/JSON exports and API streaming are available.

qa.question: Is on-prem available?
qa.answer: Not currently; we support private cloud options.

qa.question: What’s the SLA?
qa.answer: 99.9% availability on Business and Enterprise plans.

qa.question: How do I contact support?
qa.answer: Via the portal or email; priority support on paid plans.
